sent.orig: Tucker Bounds, a McCain spokesman, could barely utter two consecutive sentences without mentioning the plumber.
sent.trans: 而麦凯恩的发言人塔克。邦兹几乎是不提这位水暖工就说不上一句整话了。

sent.orig: The spokesman voiced the workers' dissatisfaction.
sent.trans: 发言人表示了工人们的不满情绪。

sent.orig: The Siemens agreement is the first to involve a financial settlement, a World Bank spokesman said.
sent.trans: 世界银行发言人说，西门子的协议是第一个涉及财务条款的和解协议。

sent.orig: He chose his friend to act as his spokesman.
sent.trans: 他选朋友为他的代言人。

sent.orig: The spokesman voiced the feeling of the crowd.
sent.trans: 这位发言人表达了群众的感情。
